title: DIDs for public services in the US
description:
Trying to make local government interactions frictionless using DIDs and DIDs documents.

Decentralize public data access and ownership.
solution: I would like to be able to build software that allows government to manage and issue all types of transactions with DIDs.
experience: I have a background in data architecture and full stack web development.I have finished the Plutus pioneer program lectures and I enjoyed it
